entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ValidateDataAnnotations doesn't work for nullable types #109483
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Dependency Injection registration of classes that implent more than one interface #109480
  • typeof() prevents the assembly from unloading #109479
  • X.509 Cert #109478
    Future
  • System.GC.Collect() cannot be called in a Lua/LuaJIT callstack #109475

Closed

  • Issue with 'AfterTargets="Publish"' and PublishAot #109414
  • [Bug] COM component using netstandard2.0 library with correct binding redirects cannot find dependency #109417

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Simple importer single-block forward substitution #109482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve containment for widening intrinsics #109474
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update dynamic methods reference #109473
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix condition in PAL's SetThreadDescription #109470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [MonoVM] Fix assert on startup with abcrem optimization enabled #108469
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update Roslyn to 4.13.0-1.24510.9 #109467
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary unsafe keywords #109231
    area-System.Collections
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: move QMARK expansion before morph #109469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add regression testing for source generated with .NET 9 #109448
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for UTF-8 in PemEncoding #109438
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605

Closed

  • project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for '.NETStandard,Version=v2.0' #2563
    Discussion
  • clearer exception when calling dotnet pack on global tool that depends on packages with `dependency` #9564
    Backlog
  • Reference to project with Nuget packet lead to deploying packet assembly into destination folder even if set Private and CopyLocalSatelliteAssemblies. #2491
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Make dotnet-watch tests TFM agnostic #44604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Increase Arm64 test build timeout #44595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler: thinks a local's type is that of another local #75710

PullRequests

Created

  • Recalculate if LSP inlay hint cache miss #75709
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Modify Capacity growth rate to be linear instead of doubling on resize. #75708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #58767
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware, updates #58766
  • Perf improvement: single_query #58765
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, mvc #58764
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #58763
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, single_query #58762
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json_middleware, updates #58761
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, plaintext #58760
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, json #58759
  • Perf regression: updates, updates #58758
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58757
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #58756
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_ef, updates #58755
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #58754
  • `IHttpRequestBodyDetectionFeature` returns true for GET requests with HTTP/3 #58753

Closed

  • Exceptions from IHubActivator.Create are not being propagated to SignalR Client #58749
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58690

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix compilation with latest roslyn #58769
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Remove GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #58738
    area-networking
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fluent System design kit for MAUI #25645

Closed

  • Triggers are not working on Frame control in .net maui #19127
    Backlog
  • HarmonyOS has a huge market in China, are you considering supporting it? #25639
  • 99 erreurs chargement packages #25643

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip invalidation on propagation #25647
    do-not-merge
  • Measure spike #25646
    do-not-merge
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-frame

Updated

  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiled model generates code that attempts to reference private methods in value converters #35033
  • Compiled model fails to distinguish between types with same name in different namespaces #35032

Closed

  • Unable to create a migration for OracleDB #35030

PullRequests

Merged

    tell-mode
